commit.message:
Auto merge of #31160 - nxnfufunezn:ppwild-31073, r=eddyb

Fixes #31073

+
+// pp-exact:issue-31073.pp
+
+fn main() {
+    fn f1(x: i32, y: i32) -> i32 { y }
+    let f: fn(_, i32) -> i32 = f1;
+    f(1, 2);
+}
